attr.title: For a Vast Future
attr.desc: War has ended in Seralia, but the scars are far from healed. Explore a dystopian landscape and build weapons from scrap parts to use in battle. Recruit companions and travel in style in your trusty motorbike as you uncover the depths of a deep government conspiracy. The future is vast.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy all game files into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1544000/For_a_Vast_Future/) and copy all game files into the `assets` folder.
